summary: This bill, H.R. 5588, seeks to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 170 Main Street in Westhampton Beach, New York, as the "Jolly 51 Memorial Post Office Building." The bill outlines the official designation and mandates that all relevant legal and official documents be updated to reflect the new name. Introduced in the House of Representatives on September 26, 2025, it was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. This bill is a straightforward recognition of a memorial.
